text: Sloboda was a type of settlement in Belarus, Russia, Ukraine and other Slavic states. Sloboda, Svoboda or similar means freedom or liberty in the Slavic languages and may also refer to: *Sloboda (surname) *FK Sloboda Tuzla, a football club in Bosnia and Herzegovina *FK Sloboda Užice *FK Sloboda Novi Grad *Sloboda Ukraine, a historical region of Ukraine *Sloboda Čačak, a Serbian defense manufacture company *Sloboda (rural locality), name of several rural localities in Russia *Słoboda, Podlaskie Voivodeship, Poland *Słoboda, Podkarpackie Voivodeship, Poland *Sloboda-Komarivtsi, Ukraine ==See also== *Slobozia (disambiguation) *Slobodskoy (disambiguation) *Svoboda (disambiguation), cognate spelling
title: Sloboda (disambiguation)
